Description: An entity to display messages from the titles.txt file on the HUD. You probably are better off with the much more customizable [game_text](../game_text) entity.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to display message.
Name of the message from titles.txt to display.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: The message can show up only once.
Everyone will see the message, instead of only the !activator.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: An optional sound effect to play. Path starts in the 'sound'-folder.
The volume, from 0 to 10, to play the sound at.
The radius in which the sound can be heard.
